#summary How to compile and install miralium
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

Mira requires java 1.5 and the [http://trove4j.sourceforge.net/ trove] library.

  # Download the source code using [http://subversion.tigris.org/ subversion]:
{{{
svn checkout http://miralium.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ miralium
}}}
  # Compile (in the miralium directory):
{{{
javac -cp trove-2.1.0.jar edu/lium/mira/*.java
}}}
  # Create jar file:
{{{
jar xf trove-2.1.0.jar gnu
jar cfm mira.jar manifest.txt edu/ LICENSE LICENSE.trove gnu/
rm -rf gnu/
}}}
  # Copy the jar to an executable location:
{{{
mkdir ~/bin
cp mira mira.jar ~/bin
}}}
  # Add the executable location to your path variable (assumes bash):
{{{
export PATH=$PATH:~/bin
}}}
  # Run mira:
{{{
mira
}}}
